alert.note: Alert for Bandera; Medina (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:42PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Medina, southeastern Bandera and northwestern Bexar Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 242 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lakehills to near Government Canyon State Natural Area to Leon Springs. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, San Antonio Int Airport, Leon Valley, Helotes, Fair Oaks Ranch, Alamo Heights, Terrell Hills, Shavano Park, Hollywood Park, Cross Mountain, Olmos Park, The Dominion, Quihi, Mico, Government Canyon State Natural Area, Sea World, Cliff, Leon Springs, Rio Medina and Lakehills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
